Constructor Detail

Sokoban

public Sokoban()
Constructs a new Sokoban object and set up the GUI.

Method Detail

doAction

public void doAction(java.lang.String action)
Moves the worker in the specified direction, if possible. If there is box in front of the Worker and a space in front of the box, then push the box. Otherwise, if there is anything in front of the Worker, do nothing.

Parameters:
action - the action to perform

doKey

public void doKey(java.lang.String key)
Responds to key actions

draw

public void draw()
Draw the grid of squares on the screen, and the Worker

load

public void load(int level)
Load a grid of squares (and Worker position) from a file

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

move

public void move(java.lang.String direction)
Moves the worker into the new position (guaranteed to be empty)

Parameters:
direction - the direction the worker is heading

oppositeDirection

public java.lang.String oppositeDirection(java.lang.String direction)
Returns:
the direction that is opposite of the parameter

pull

public void pull(java.lang.String direction)
Pull: (useful for undoing a push in the opposite direction) move the Worker in direction from direction, pulling the box into the Worker's old position

push

public void push(java.lang.String direction)
Push: Moves the Worker, pushing the box one step

Parameters:
direction - the direction the worker is heading
